    • getTags

      @ResponseBody @GetMapping({"/","/{id}"}) public List<com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.models.Tag> getTags(@PathVariable(required=false) String id) throws com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.IdNotFound, com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.InvalidIdInputInformation
      Will retrieve Tag/s from Database
      Parameters:
      id - ID that if given will return specific Tag that has said ID, otherwise a list of Tags
      Returns:
      will return pertaining List-of or single Tag retrieved from DB
      Throws:
      com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.IdNotFound - Exception thrown when given ID is not found
      com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.InvalidIdInputInformation - Exception thrown when given ID is incorrectly entered

    • deleteTag

      @DeleteMapping("/drop/{id}") public com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.models.Tag deleteTag(@PathVariable String id) throws com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.IdNotFound, com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.InvalidIdInputInformation, com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.CertificateAssociatedException
      Will drop a Tag from Database
      Parameters:
      id - ID of Tag to search and drop
      Returns:
      Deleted Tag
      Throws:
      com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.IdNotFound - Exception thrown when given ID is not found
      com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.InvalidIdInputInformation - Exception thrown when given ID is incorrectly entered
      com.jhuguet.sb_taskv1.app.exceptions.CertificateAssociatedException - Exception thrown when Tag is associated to a GiftCertificate and cannot be deleted
